name: THE DIEGEON
description:
THE DIEGEON

In The Diegeon you are in control of a blue die and your task is to eliminate those pesky green dice standing in your way!

So ready, aim and roll your dice towards the enemies to collide and annihilate them. Awesome upgrades will change how your rolls work and bring new ways of defeating your enemies. So... we think it's about time you roll that die
